name: Dante
description: Seeker of knowledge. Keeper of history. Daring researcher of Leverian lore. Dante composes arcane tales to support allies and devastate enemies.

abilities.name: Noctua
abilities.description: Open Noctua, Dante’s Exalted Tome, and unleash a tale of woe upon his enemies.

abilities.name: Light Verse
abilities.description: Dante's vitalizing composition grants him and his allies Overguard and increases their Health.

abilities.name: Dark Verse
abilities.description: Dante's composition draws blood from nearby enemies, inflicting <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Damage upon them.

abilities.name: Final Verse
abilities.description:
Dante must compose two other Verses before his Final Verse. TRIUMPH: Two Light Verses cast in succession invigorate allies with a buff that increases Health and grants Overguard. Kills and assists briefly regenerate Overguard.
Dante must compose two other Verses before his Final Verse. TRAGEDY: Two Dark Verses cast in succession attack enemies. Damage Over Time from Slash, Heat and Toxin Status Effects accumulates in a single blast.
Dante must compose two other Verses before his Final Verse. WORDWARDEN: A Light Verse followed by a Dark Verse supports allies with copies of Noctua. Noctua copies synchronize their attacks with their designated ally’s attacks.
Dante must compose two other Verses before his Final Verse. PAGEFLIGHT: A Dark Verse followed by a Light Verse summons Paragrimms that swoop at enemies, making them vulnerable to Status Chance and Status Damage, as well as drawing enemy attacks away from allies.

languages.description: Wissenssuchender. Bewahrer der Geschichte. Wagemutiger Forscher der Leverian-Überlieferungen. Dante verfasst geheimnisvolle Geschichten, um Verbündete zu unterstützen und Feinde zu vernichten.
languages.name: Dante

languages.description: Protecteur des connaissances. Gardien du passé. Chercheur audacieux de la tradition du Cabinet de Curiosités. Dante compose des contes mystérieux pour soutenir ses alliés et dévaster ses ennemis.
languages.name: Dante

languages.description: Protettore di conoscenza. Guardiano della storia. Audace ricercatore della storia del Leverian. Dante compone racconti arcani per sostenere gli alleati e devastare i nemici.
languages.name: Dante

languages.description: 지식의 추구자. 역사의 수호자. 레베리안 이야기의 대담한 연구자. 단테는 신비로운 이야기들을 자아내어 아군들을 지원하고 적들을 파괴합니다.
languages.name: 단테

languages.description: Buscador de conocimiento. Guardián de la historia. Atrevido investigador del saber popular del Leverian. Dante compone cuentos arcanos para apoyar a los aliados y devastar a los enemigos.
languages.name: Dante

languages.description: 知识探求者。历史守护者。莱弗博物馆传说的勇敢学者。Dante 创作神秘的诗篇来支援队友并摧毁敌人。
languages.name: Dante

languages.description: Изыскатель мудрости. Хранитель легенд. Смелый покоритель тайн Левериана. Данте творит мистические сказания, вдохновляя союзников и ослабляя противников.
languages.name: Данте

languages.description: 知識の探求者。歴史の守り手。レベリアンの伝承への果断な探究者。Danteは味方を支援し、敵を壊滅させるために神秘の物語を構成する。
languages.name: Dante

languages.description: Poszukiwacz wiedzy. Strażnik historii. Odważny badacz wiedzy Leverian. Dante tworzy tajemne opowieści, by wspierać sojuszników i niszczyć wrogów.
languages.name: Dante

languages.description: Protetor do conhecimento. Guardião da história. Investigador destemido do Leverian. Dante compõe contos arcanos para apoiar seus aliados e devastar seus inimigos.
languages.name: Dante

languages.description: 知識的追求者。歷史的監護者。Leverian 傳說的勇敢研究者。Dante 創作神秘故事來支援友方及摧毀敵人。
languages.name: Dante

languages.description: Dante คือผู้แสวงหาความรู้ ผู้รักษาประวัติศาสตร์ให้คงอยู่ นักวิจัยผู้กล้าหาญในตำนานของ Leverian ที่แต่งนิยายลึกลับเพื่อช่วยเหลือพันธมิตรและทำลายล้างศัตรู
languages.name: Dante

languages.description: Bilgi arayıcısı. Tarihin koruyucusu. Leverian biliminin cesur araştırmacısı. Dante, müttefiklerini desteklemek ve düşmanları mahvetmek için gizemli hikayeler yazıyor.
languages.name: Dante

languages.description: Шукач знань. Оберігач історії. Відважний дослідник збірника знань Леверія. Данте розповідає містичні оповіді, щоби підтримати союзників та здолати ворогів.
languages.name: Данте
